requestParams.description: Dialogue in the Dark Hyderabad is a unique dining and social experience where visitors are guided through a completely dark environment by visually impaired individuals. This immersive experience aims to promote empathy and understanding of the visually impaired community while heightening the other senses through a "Taste of Darkness" dining concept. The experience includes navigating a specially designed space, interacting with others in the dark, and enjoying a meal where taste and smell are emphasized.
